main event: Multiple witnesses observed unidentified glowing objects in the sky at Kadena AFB, Okinawa on 20 September 1957 and on the night of 29 September 1957.
interesting points: Five witnesses confirmed seeing the objects, which were described as oval and circular with a glowing appearance., The first sighting lasted 5 to 10 seconds with the object making four passes., Lt O'Connor observed two bright lights moving at around 600 mph before separating., The sightings were characterized by the objects displaying erratic motion but ultimately traveling in a North-South direction., There were no accompanying sounds during either sighting.
sighted object: Oval shaped object and two bright lights connected by a bar
witness description: military personnel stationed at Kadena Air Force Base
